channel.title: OpenAI on David Winterbottom
channel.description: Recent content in OpenAI on David Winterbottom

item.title: OpenAI Git poetry
item.description: OpenAI provides a REST API where you can generate prompt completions. Here’s a minimal example where a JSON payload is piped into httpie: $ export OPENAI_API_KEY="..." # fill in your API key here $ echo '{"model": "text-davinci-002", "prompt": "Write a poem about cheese"}' \ | http https://api.openai.com/v1/completions Authorization:"Bearer $OPENAI_API_KEY" \ | jq -r '.choices[0].text There's nothing quite like cheese It's rich, creamy, Quite. We can extend this by dynamically building the prompt string.
